Alert Name: bush
Gasoline hits record $3.10 a gallon
Prices top highs hit after Hurricane Katrina; rose 5 cents last week and 16 cents from a year ago.
05/14/07 05:10 PM, EDT
The average price U.S. consumers pay for gasoline has hit a record $3.10 a gallon, the government said on Monday.
